game.name: Rabbit Comes Home
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Play as a lone rabbit sent to the outer space on the journey back home. Defend the ship against relentless alien waves, harvest precious resources, upgrade under pressure, and survive the crushing energy deficit. Every warp brings you one step closer to home… or to ruin.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play as a lone rabbit sent to the outer space on the journey back home. Defend the ship against relentless alien waves, harvest precious resources, upgrade under pressure, and survive the crushing energy deficit. Every warp brings you one step closer to home… or to ruin.
